fa3cd506-5c1a-47a7-8569-0ece1246a036.description: Earners of the IIX Institute's Measuring Impact for Sustainability certification of completion have developed an exceptional understanding of impact and impact measurement in the context of sustainable finance and impact. This includes awareness of ESG and impact measurement, impact assessments for investors, and social return on investment (SROI) - all within IIX's Risk-Return-Impact (RRI) paradigm.
fa3cd506-5c1a-47a7-8569-0ece1246a036.name: Measuring Impact for Sustainability

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the IIX Institute impact measurement masterclass
Successfully pass online Certificate Exam

caa645a7-f434-4e5c-a30d-331c2444a887.description: The Orange Bond Initiative™ is the world’s first asset class built specifically as a solution to the gender equality financing gap. The Initiative’s mission is to empower ~100 million women and girls worldwide by unlocking US$10 billion by 2030. By becoming a signatory you are supporting the development of a gender-empowered financial system.
caa645a7-f434-4e5c-a30d-331c2444a887.name: The Orange Bond Pledge

badge_template_activities.title: Signatory of The Orange Bond Pledge

a271fffd-0cba-49f6-8e93-ada9006d6c03.description: Earners of the IIX Institute's Innovative Financing Solutions for Resilience Certificate of Completion have successfully achieved deep, practical insights in designing and structuring various innovative finance products for a post-COVID-19 economy. They have been enabled to build effective partnerships that can catalyze the implementation of sustainable solutions in the face of an emerging new norm.
a271fffd-0cba-49f6-8e93-ada9006d6c03.name: Innovative Financing Solutions for Resilience

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the IIX Institute Innovative Financing Solutions for Resilience Masterclass
Successfully pass the online Certificate Exam on the IIX Impact Institute Portal

8e60d07d-0fed-4642-8e06-740e0ee5925e.description: Students of IIX Institute's 'Mobilizing Finance for the SDGs' online course have gained a foundational understanding of how impact investing space can catalyze global efforts to achieve the Sustainable Development Goals. Their knowledge of this rapidly growing landscape will prove beneficial in mainstreaming impact and creating lasting change.
8e60d07d-0fed-4642-8e06-740e0ee5925e.name: Mobilizing Finance for the SDGs

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Mobilizing Finance for the SDGs online course
Successfully pass the final quiz of the Mobilizing Finance for the SDGs online course

c7ced46e-1343-4879-904e-4f8de39587d0.description: Students of the IIX Institute's Investment Readiness and Impact Assessment course have successfully developed foundational skills to examine and measure their business impact through a gender lens. They have also gained a holistic understanding of the various impact investing mechanisms and deal structures available to for-profit and non-profit organizations. They are empowered to build and grow sustainable organizations by creating impactful business strategies and financial models.
c7ced46e-1343-4879-904e-4f8de39587d0.name: Investment Readiness and Impact Assessment

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the IIX Institute Investment Readiness and Impact Assessment Short Course
Complete the assignment of outlining an organized and practical business plan

b81acfb7-a93e-4b91-bc00-09d7ae42c620.description: Students of IIX Institute's 'Key Players in Impact Investing' online course have gained key insights into the rapidly growing landscape of impact investing and the various roles played by key stakeholders. With their new knowledge, they are adept at working cross-functionally with diverse stakeholders on initiatives that put impact first.
b81acfb7-a93e-4b91-bc00-09d7ae42c620.name: Key Players in Impact Investing

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Key Players in Impact Investing online course
Successfully pass the final quiz of the Key Players in Impact Investing online course

69de4942-9953-4243-a047-ccdbcacb4700.description: Students of the Introduction to Impact Investing and Innovative Finance Course have successfully achieved a foundational understanding of impact investing. With their newly gained knowledge, they are empowered to lead with an inclusive mindset and address the complexities that emerge with innovative finance.
69de4942-9953-4243-a047-ccdbcacb4700.name: Introduction to Impact Investing and Innovative Finance

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to Impact Investing and Innovative Finance course
Complete Chapter Quizzes

0146b7d1-345e-4ff3-80d7-1650c0ca3d56.description: Students of the Introduction to Impact Investing course have achieved an understanding of impact investing in the Asia Pacific. They are equipped with the knowledge needed to successfully apply financial and social approaches to their impact investing practices.
0146b7d1-345e-4ff3-80d7-1650c0ca3d56.name: Introduction to Impact Investing

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to Impact Investing course

5b2f967d-ac1e-45ef-a7f1-157b59fd66a8.description: Earners of the IIX Institute's Introduction to Investing in Inclusion Certificate of Completion have gained the requisite skills for incorporating a gender-transformative mindset to their organizations and investment practices, earning the skills needed to increase gender equity. As a catalyst for change, their new understanding will prove beneficial in creating systemic change through improved organizational thinking.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the IIX Institute Introduction to Investing in Inclusion Short Course

37abbb5a-b84b-4635-8c96-c8f6aaa53507.description: Students of IIX Institute's 'From Philanthropy to Philanthrocapitalism' online course have developed a thorough understanding of the intersecting worlds of the impact investing and non-profit sector. They are cognizant of the needs of non-profits and how they can be best supported to create practical solutions to address global issues. With their newly gained knowledge, they will be beneficial to growing the ecosystem and giving voice and value to underserved communities everywhere.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the From Philanthropy to Philanthrocapitalism online course

17a0173a-b81b-49d4-ab29-02fa7f5ece2c.description: Earners of IIX Institute's 'Creating System-Wide Change: A Finance Lens' digital credential have gained in-depth knowledge on how ecosystems can be built and grown to drive progress for the Sustainable Development Goals. Their keen understanding can help catalyze stakeholders' participation in the sustainable investing movement and identify more opportunities to generate both social and financial returns.
17a0173a-b81b-49d4-ab29-02fa7f5ece2c.name: Creating System-Wide Change: A Finance Lens

78502a34-e7de-4573-96fb-295dcad8b41e.description: Earners of this digital credential have successfully completed IIX Institute's series on "How to Be an Effective Impact Investor" and have a thorough understanding of how to strategize, make, and manage their impact investments. They are positioned to thrive in an investment climate with portfolios that effectively balance risk, return, and impact. They know what it means to be an impactful ecosystem player who can support enterprises and help them grow.
78502a34-e7de-4573-96fb-295dcad8b41e.name: How to Be an Impact Investor Course Series

badge_template_activities.title: Complete Part I of the "How to Be an Effective Impact Investor" course series
Complete Part II of the "How to Be an Effective Impact Investor" course series
Successfully pass final quizzes for both Parts I and II of the "How to Be an Effective Impact Investor" course series

ddbc6bbb-db5e-42aa-a744-ef359b2d800c.description: Earners of this credential have acquired the complete set of skills necessary to grow their business and scale impact from IIX Institute's three-part series on 'Capital Raise'. They have gained a deep understanding of the capital raise process and are up-to-date on best operational practices and industry trends. With their new skill set, they are well-positioned to facilitate a successful capital raise journey - from acquiring the right form of investment to closing a deal with an investor.
ddbc6bbb-db5e-42aa-a744-ef359b2d800c.name: Capital Raise Course Series

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Fundamentals of Capital Raise online course
Complete the Capital Raise Process online course
Complete the Closing the Deal online course
Successfully pass all final quizzes of each course in the Capital Raise course series

3d1c5b50-daa0-4098-9028-0add8132dd2e.description: Earners of the IIX Institute's Introduction to Investing with a Gender Lens certification of completion have developed an exceptional understanding of what gender lens investing really means, how to outline the gaps and opportunities that exist in the space, and lastly how to define the role that stakeholders can play in building an ecosystem for women empowerment.

7195a0db-3728-4eac-9ac1-e7de858fbbee.description: Students of IIX Institute's 'Introduction to Pricing for Enterprises' online course have gained a foundational understanding of how to price and monetize on their organization's innovation. They are equipped with the knowledge to create and implement pricing strategies that communicate the value of their products to consumers while also maximizing revenue. With their acquired knowledge, they are better positioned to play a pivotal role in their organization's growth journey.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the Introduction to Pricing for Enterprises online course

0eded85e-1d2e-4c37-9d63-b58f50de9ab1.description: Earners of IIX Institute's 'Financing Innovation: Navigating the FinTech (R)Evolution' digital credential have gained a foundational knowledge of FinTech. 5bec63a7-58fb-47c3-90a8-06ad82f314ef.description: Earners of IIX Institute's 'Building an Enabling Environment' digital credential have successfully gained the know-how on creating an an enabling environment for sustainability.
